member.name: EMRSETBKCOLOR
member.summary: The EMRSETBKCOLOR and EMRSETTEXTCOLOR structures contain members for the SetBkColor and SetTextColor enhanced metafile records.

member.name: EMRSETBKCOLOR.emr
member.summary: Base structure for all record types.

member.name: EMRSETBKCOLOR.crColor
member.summary: Color value. To make a COLORREF value, use the macro.
